reviewText: fun, i saw this movie first when it came out in spain.  i love almodovar and this movie does not leave him behind!

It's different, but great. It reflects a time period in Spain where they were finally free to display a different side of art and ideologies... things that were repressed from the Franco time period. It goes against the stereotypes of the catholic church... just watch it.

The film is not excellent but the characters are. The film should be watched for the characters it creates. An LSD addicted nun, another is a lesbian, and a drug dealer of dubious character seeks refuge in a convent. Must watch it. If there was ever a funniest attach agasint the church, this is it.
